Description: This template coordinates the running of the child-templates for the S3, SG, RDS, IAM, EFS, ELBv2 and EC2 stack-elements

BackupBucketInventoryTracking.Description: (Optional) Whether to enable generic bucket inventory-tracking. Requires setting of the 'BackupReportingBucket' parameter.

BackupBucketName.Description: (Optional) Name to set for S3 Bucket used for longer-term retention of backups. Will be randomly named if left un-set.

BackupReportingBucket.ConstraintDescription: String must start with 'arn:' (or be left wholly blank).
BackupReportingBucket.Description: (Optional) Destination for storing analytics data. Must be provided in ARN format.

FinalExpirationDays.ConstraintDescription: Must be an integer value greater than '0'.
FinalExpirationDays.Description: Number of days to retain objects before aging them out of the bucket

RetainIncompleteDays.ConstraintDescription: Must be an integer value between '0' and '30'
RetainIncompleteDays.Description: Number of days to retain objects that were not completely uploaded.

RootTemplateUrl.Description: Root URL where all templated files are stored.

ShardBucketInventoryTracking.Description: (Optional) Whether to enable generic bucket inventory-tracking. Requires setting of the 'ShardReportingBucket' parameter.

ShardBucketName.Description: (Optional) Name to set for S3 Bucket used for hosting live Artifactory data. Will be randomly named if left un-set.

ShardReportingBucket.ConstraintDescription: String must start with 'arn:' (or be left wholly blank).
ShardReportingBucket.Description: (Optional) Destination for storing analytics data. Must be provided in ARN format.

TargetVPC.Description: ID of the VPC to deploy cluster nodes into.

TierToGlacierDays.ConstraintDescription: Must be an integer value between '1' and '30'
TierToGlacierDays.Description: Number of days to retain objects in standard storage tier.
